title: 0 LP gain
body:
So i won a game after having 94 lp, after the win i expected lol to say, congrats to promo. (Right?)
Instead i got no message and no lp. Why is that happening, after i got around 20 lp after my last win.

replies.body: I looked into this for you, but didn't see anything out of the ordinary.  It looks like your last game was at 73 LP.  You won another match which got you to 94 LP with Tryndamere.  Was this for a different match?
